sourcesContent:
<template>
  <PortfolioList
    title="设计作品"
    description="展示优秀的设计作品，分享设计灵感"
    type="design"
    :categories="designCategories"
    :menu-groups="designMenuGroups"
  />
</template>

<script setup>
import PortfolioList from '@/components/portfolio/PortfolioList.vue'

const designCategories = [
  { id: 'all', name: '全部' },
  {
    id: 'ui',
    name: 'UI设计',
    children: [
      { id: 'mobile', name: '移动端' },
      { id: 'web', name: '网页端' },
      { id: 'desktop', name: '桌面端' }
    ]
  },
  {
    id: 'graphic',
    name: '平面设计',
    children: [
      { id: 'poster', name: '海报' },
      { id: 'brand', name: '品牌' },
      { id: 'packaging', name: '包装' }
    ]
  },
  {
    id: 'web',
    name: 'Web设计',
    children: [
      { id: 'website', name: '网站设计' },
      { id: 'landing', name: '落地页' },
      { id: 'admin', name: '后台系统' }
    ]
  }
]

const designMenuGroups = [
  {
    title: '设计分类',
    items: designCategories.map(category => ({
      name: category.name,
      path: `/portfolio/design?category=${category.id}`,
      icon: category.id === 'all' ? HomeIcon :
            category.id === 'ui' ? DevicePhoneMobileIcon :
            category.id === 'graphic' ? SwatchIcon :
            GlobeAltIcon
    }))
  }
]
</script>
